articles.title: Celtic legend Larsson lifts lid on secret torment he feels after brother Robert took drugs overdose - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
HENRIK LARSSON has lifted the lid on his secret torment over his lost brother Robert.
Speaking to Kris Boyd and Robert Snodgrass on the Lockdown Tactics podcast, the Celtic legend has revealed how h… [+3054 chars]
